name: Employee of the month (itch) (Nitsugua, Julien G, CorentinF)
name_original: Employee of the month (itch) (Nitsugua, Julien G, CorentinF)
description:
It's a competitive world out there.

Every week, the best of the our company's employees is rewarded for their contribution. But this week, it will be you, Guidji.

You will need to work hard. Your envious colleagues will certenly attempt to sabotage your success.

But if you persevere and make it all the way to Friday night, you will be employee of the week.

This was made in 10 days for the WonderJam 3. We would love your feedback in the comments!
